channel.title: Image Recognition on Mikhail Shilkov
channel.description: Recent content in Image Recognition on Mikhail Shilkov

item.title: Building a Poker Bot: String and Number Recognition
item.description: This is the second part of Building a Poker Bot series where I describe my experience developing bot software to play in online poker rooms. I’m building the bot with .NET framework and F# language which makes the task relatively easy and very enjoyable.

item.title: Building a Poker Bot: Card Recognition
item.description: This is the first part of Building a Poker Bot series where I describe my experience developing bot software for online poker rooms. I’m building the bot with .NET framework and F# language which makes the task relatively easy and very enjoyable.
